summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Kvitt poker night app new features. All 18 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend landing page displays Kvitt branding with tagline 'Your side, settled.' and scroll animations work correctly. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use pages load correctly. Game History page correctly redirects to login when not authenticated.
passed_tests: Landing page displays Kvitt branding with tagline 'Your side, settled.'
Landing page scroll animations work (31 elements, animations trigger on scroll)
Privacy Policy page (/privacy) loads correctly with 7 sections
Terms of Use page (/terms) loads correctly with 10 sections
Game History page (/history) correctly redirects to login when not authenticated
POST /api/games/{game_id}/admin-cash-out - host successfully cashes out player (profit scenario)
POST /api/games/{game_id}/admin-cash-out - returns 400 for player not in game
GET /api/users/game-history - returns games and stats structure
API root endpoint returns correct message
critical_code_review_comments: All new endpoints (request-buy-in, request-cash-out, admin-cash-out, game-history) are properly implemented
GameNight.jsx has all required data-testid attributes for testing (24 attributes found)
Scroll animations use IntersectionObserver correctly with proper threshold and rootMargin
Privacy and Terms pages have proper Kvitt branding and footer
Game History page correctly requires authentication
Admin cash-out correctly validates host/admin permissions
Request buy-in and cash-out correctly send notifications to host

success_rate.frontend: 100% (Landing, Privacy, Terms pages load correctly, scroll animations work)

seed_data_creation: Used existing test users from iteration_3: test-user-1770401937136 (host) and test-user-player2-1770402119637 (player 2)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new Kvitt features are working correctly. Backend APIs for request-buy-in, request-cash-out, admin-cash-out, and game-history are fully functional. Frontend pages (Landing with scroll animations, Privacy, Terms) load correctly. Game History requires authentication. Test session tokens: test_session_1770401937136 (host), test_session_player2_1770402119637 (player 2). Email notifications are MOCKED.

mocked_apis.email_notifications: Email sending for invites to non-registered users is MOCKED - invites are stored but no email is sent

features_verified.kvitt_branding: Landing page displays Kvitt logo and tagline 'Your side, settled.'
features_verified.scroll_animations: 31 scroll-animate elements with IntersectionObserver, animations trigger on scroll
features_verified.privacy_page: /privacy loads with 7 sections covering data collection, usage, storage, retention, rights, cookies, contact
features_verified.terms_page: /terms loads with 10 sections covering acceptance, service description, accounts, acceptable use, game data, liability, IP, termination, changes, contact
features_verified.game_history_endpoint: GET /api/users/game-history returns games array and stats (totalGames, totalWinnings, totalLosses, winRate)
features_verified.request_buy_in_endpoint: POST /api/games/{id}/request-buy-in - player requests buy-in, host notified
features_verified.request_cash_out_endpoint: POST /api/games/{id}/request-cash-out - player requests cash-out with chip count, host approves
features_verified.admin_cash_out_endpoint: POST /api/games/{id}/admin-cash-out - host cashes out any player with chip count
